mapper.select: select fm.id,fm.create_time,fm.user_id,fm.address,fm.reply_user_id,fm.content,ui.nickname,ui.avatar from blog_tipsoon_comment fm left join sys_user u on fm.user_id=u.user_id left join blog_user_info ui on ui.id=u.user_info_id where fm.tipsoon_id = #{tipsoonId} and fm.parent_id is null order by fm.create_time desc
